title: 【Student Dormitories】 National Dong Hwa University 112 Academic Year Second Semester Student Dormitory Latest 【End of Semester Closing, Luggage Storage, and Summer Accommodation】 Adjustment Announcement
author: 鍾佩玲
content:
分類： 行政公告, 活動公告
來源： 學務處 - 鍾佩玲 - free22011@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話03890-6217
對象： 全校學生_大一_大二_大三_大四以上_碩士生_博士生
標題： 【Student Dormitories】 National Dong Hwa University 112 Academic Year Second Semester Student Dormitory Latest 【End of Semester Closing, Luggage Storage, and Summer Accommodation】 Adjustment Announcement
日期： Mon, 20 May 2024 16:06:14 +0800
附檔： 1.Luggage Deposit Dormitory Moving and Closing Announcement.pdf (105 KB)   2-2. Summer Dormitory Moving Plan (for Dorm 1 and Dorm 5).pdf (550 KB)   2-2. Summer Plan for  Dorm 1.pdf (43 KB)   2-2. Summer Plan for Dorm 5.pdf (43 KB)   
Dear residents,
The semester will conclude in mid to late June. Please note the following important details regarding the dormitory closure, luggage storage, and summer accommodation:
1. 【Dormitory Closes on June 24th at 12:00 Noon】: All residents must complete their move-out by 12:00 noon on June 24th, Monday. Those who have scheduled to move out can apply for luggage storage:
a. Luggage Storage Area: The luggage will be stored according to your dormitory allocation for the next semester (for Dormitory 3(male/female) residents, storage will be at West Community House (Duorong Hall); originally, those who applied for Dormitory(female) will be uniformly rearranged to Dormitory 2 Dormitory, thus their luggage will also be moved).
Note: If the designated storage area is full, luggage will be relocated to another location.
b. Luggage Storage Times:
   June 15（Sat）～6/16（Sun）：14:00-18:00
Note: West Community House (Duorong Hall) operates on a reservation basis on 6/15 (Sat) from 16:00 to 17:00. (Reservations must be made by Tuesday of that week; otherwise, they will not be accepted.).
   June 17（Mon）～6/20（Thu）：19:00-21:00
   June 21（Fri）：14:00-18:00、19:00-21:00
   June 22（Sat）：10:00-12:00、14:00-18:00、19:00-21:00
   June 23（Sun）：14:00-18:00、19:00-21:00
   June 24（Mon）：09:00-11:30  
※Additional Notice: West Community House (Duorong Hall) will provide additional luggage storage service times, which will be available by online reservation: https://forms.gle/LQm42iJRQjZKEUyv5. (Reservations must be made by Tuesday of that week; otherwise, they will not be accepted.).
May 23、May 30、June 6、June 13（Every Thursday）：19:00-20:00
　 May 25、June 1、June 8（Every Saturday）：16:00-17:00
c. Truck Assistance for Luggage Transfer: Available on June 22 (Sat) and June 24 (Mon).
2. 【Operations on the Day of Dormitory Closure, June 24th】: This semester, the direct transfer of luggage to the dorm rooms for the next semester has been cancelled. Only residents of Dormitory 1, 4, 5, and 6 who have applied for the same room next semester can store their luggage in the dorm rooms.
a. Tasks to be completed by 12:00 noon: Clear and vacate the room.
b. Room Inspection and Penalty Tasks start at 13:00.
c. Summer Accommodation Procedures begin at 18:00.
3. 【Additional Notes on End-of-Term Dorm Closure, Luggage Storage, and Summer Accommodation】: Please refer to the attached file for more details.
If you have any special concerns or questions regarding the dormitories, feel free to contact our office at the following numbers: 03-8906217.
We hope everyone stays safe and healthy,
Student Living Services Division
